participant_1.background:
I value monogamy in a relationship.
I grew up with my little sister in a small town in the Midwest.
i volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
i am east asian.

participant_2.background:
I love to take my horse, Beauty, for rides on the weekends.
i am a great baker.
I love to read about holistic health and natural remedies, so my favorite websites are those that focus on these topics.
i am a house wife.
I like to spend time with my pets because it makes me feel young.

content.text: Hi, I'm from a small town in the Midwest! Do you live in a big city?
I'm from the Midwest too! I live in a small town now, but I used to live in a big city.
What made you move to a small town?
I wanted to live a simpler life. I love to spend time with my horse, Beauty, and my pets.
That sounds really nice! I'm glad you found a place where you can be happy.
Thanks! I'm glad I met you too. It's nice to talk to someone from the Midwest.
Me too! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to bake, read, and spend time with my pets.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to bake too.
Really? What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make chocolate chip cookies. How about you?
I love to make chocolate chip cookies too! I also love to make banana bread.
Banana bread is so good! I love to eat it with a cup of coffee.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
